attributes.action: TO BAN EU WORKERS FROM APPLYING FOR COUNCIL HOUSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THROW ALL THE EXTRA EU WORKERS APPLYING FOR HOMES OF THE COUNCIL THERE ARE NO HOMES LEFT I ASK IF WE COULD BAN EU WORKERS AND ANY PERSON WITH  OUT A BRITISH PASSPORT FROM BEING ABLE TO APPLY FOR HOUSES FROM UK COUNCILS

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
